channel.title: Weapons models lost/no reloading sound/shooting crash
channel.description: I have glitch that doesn't show me weapon models([url]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/541812492010944183/8C281AF02313AEC0D0558B3AFC0025EA03A52645/[/url]). There is also problem with reloading sounds, cause I don't hear any reloading sound. Shooting with some weapons for example rocket launcher, crossbow cause crash to desktop. In attachments I added last minidump(shooting crash). PC Specs: OS: Win 7 SP1 x64 GPU: NVIDIA GTX 670 hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T20_22_33C0.mdmp (117 KB)

item.title: Weapons models lost/no reloading sound/shooting crash
item.dc:creator: bunnymustard
item.description:
MasteR\:

I have glitch that doesn’t show me weapon models(https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/541812492010944183/8C281AF02313AEC0D0558B3AFC0025EA03A52645/). There is also problem with reloading sounds, cause I don’t hear any reloading sound. Shooting with some weapons for example rocket launcher, crossbow cause crash to desktop. In attachments I added last minidump(shooting crash).
PC Specs:
OS: Win 7 SP1 x64
GPU: NVIDIA GTX 670

I’m having the exact same issues. I posted the details of my glitching in my own thread (which I wrote and posted just as this one was) here: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12685

Read full topic
item.source: Weapons models lost/no reloading sound/shooting crash
